participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, with a passion for teaching and helping others.
participant_1.background: my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. i'm fluent in english, spanish, and french.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, enjoying life as a stay-at-home dad and a fan of thrillers.
participant_2.background: my father used to work for home depot. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. i'm a stay at home dad. i have a son who is in junior high school.
